title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IX, subch. A, pt. 645 - Procedural Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IX, subch. A, pt. 645 - Procedural Regulations

State Regulations

Subpart 645-1 - General Provisions (§ 645-1.1 to 645-1.2)

Subpart 645-2 - Definitions (§ 645-2.1)

Subpart 645-3 - State Environmental Quality Review (§ 645-3.1 to 645-3.8)

Subpart 645-4 - Uniform Enforcement Procedures (§ 645-4.1 to 645-4.16)

Subpart 645-5 - Permit Application Requirements (§ 645-5.1 to 645-5.11)

Subpart 645-6 - Permit Hearing Procedures (§ 645-6.1 to 645-6.17)

Subpart 645-7 - Regulatory Fees (§ 645-7.1 to 645-7.8)

Subpart 645-8 - Variance Procedures (§ 645-8.1 to 645-8.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IX, subch. A, pt. 645

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§8-0113, 43-0107, 43-0125, 71-3303, 71-3305 and 71-3307; State Administrative

Procedure Act, § 305

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
